sokobangame.controller.modes
Class AbstractHighlighterMode

java.lang.Object
  sokobangame.controller.modes.Mode
      sokobangame.controller.modes.AbstractHighlighterMode
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.util.EventListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractCreateMode, EditMode
public abstract class AbstractHighlighterMode
extends Mode

A Mode sub-classing this will draw a tile highlighter when the user moves their mouse around the maze view. If the paint method is overridden, the tile highlighter can still be painted using the paintSquareHighlighter method,
